caseStudies.title: Figure 4: Examples of UnBias Project ‘Awareness Cards’ (reverse side shown)
caseStudies.description: The Center for Democracy and Technology has developed a 'Digital Decision Tool' to raise concerns about bias, fairness, and ethical issues in algorithmic systems, while academics from Harvard Law School and Berkman Klein Center have published documents on the impact of AI on human rights.

caseStudies.title: Emerging technologies present unique ethical challenges which
caseStudies.description: This case study discusses the importance of equipping professionals in emerging technologies with the skills to make ethically-focused decisions in their fields.
